trends: There has been one other sighting in Lithia
There were no other sightings in Lithia on or around October 20th 2013
Summary: Saw a boomerang shaped vehicle with numerous grey lights all the same color flying under the cloudcover
divs: Sighting DetailsI was laying in my hot tub in the back yard looking straight up...from the west came an object with I would guess 9 lights all the same dull grey color. It was not traveling fast just steady. It was under the cloud cover and about 2 minutes later an airplane or chopper flew in the same general direction.
